name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Threads Downloader -- Easily download videos/photo from Threads

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily download all the social videos and images you watch on Threads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download Threads videos, photos, and images
Download videos from each Threads personal channel
This is a free tool that helps users download Threads audio/video to their computers. We recommend that users do not download copyrighted content without permission.
ğŸ’¥ Threads Video Downloader Function
One click download of videos or movies
One click download of music or audiobooks
Save audio/video from restricted channels/groups to the local computer
Save private videos or images
Save personal music or audiobooks
Support downloading videos/images/photos/GIF
No password, API login or permission required
Easy to use
24/7 developer support
Supports downloading Threads media resources, photos, movies, and allows you to download the required content from any Threads channel.
ğŸ’¥ If audio/video files are available, you can download them.
ğŸ’¥ Video downloader allows you to download videos in various formats from multiple sources.
ğŸ’¥ Use this plugin to directly download audio/video online.
ğŸ’¥ Capable of downloading various types of audio, such as music, audiobooks, etc.
ğŸ’¥ Run on Chrome web pages and can be used online on Mac and Windows computers. Just install the plugin on the browser, no software needs to be installed.
Use our free tool to easily download any audio/video from Threads by following these simple steps. Follow these simple steps to download audio/video to your computer:
Install plugins.
Open Threads Network Editionï¼ˆ https://www.threads.net/ ï¼‰And log in.
Batch download: Scroll to the homepage or personal channel, click the batch download button in the bottom right corner, and the video download button will automatically appear on the plugin. Open the plugin for batch download.
Single download: After installing the plugin, a "download" button will appear at the bottom left of each video or image, and "download" will be displayed below each audio. Click here for a single download. If it doesn't appear, please click the refresh button in the bottom right corner to try again.
ğŸ•¨ Disclaimer
This extension has no connection to the official Threads application/website. This is an unofficial application developed and maintained by independent developers.
